item.description:
We're teaming up with RedPint (www.facebook.com/redpint) to have our own flash mob attend the 2nd session of the American Craft Beer Festival. You game?

RedPint has made a FREE ACBF beer check-list for anyone to use. You can find it on their Facebook page - www.facebook.com/RedPint - along with details of a fun photo contest on June 19!

Looking forward to ACBF!
- Alicia

Tickets available at http://beeradvocate.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guys in RedPint t-shirts.
item.name: American Craft Beer Fest: 2nd Session!
